lead_paragraph: Emotionally wrenching politics, foreign conflicts and shootings at home took a toll on Americans in 2016, but they entered 2017 on an optimistic note, according to a new poll that found that a majority believes things are going to get better for the country this year.

headline.main: AP New Year's Poll: Americans Enter 2017 on Optimistic Note
